thread.title: John Morgan
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by John Morgan

author: John Morgan
title: John Morgan
text: I phoned to ask for advice but after careful questioning your help desk offered to repair the shower on warranty, even though l had no proof of purchase. The engineer quickly found the problem and replaced the shower, all as promised and when they promised. Excellent
